```{r, include=FALSE}
setClass("Workshop", representation(
    title = "character",
    github = "character",
    docker = "character"
))
Workshop <- function(...) {
    new("Workshop", ...)
}
setGeneric(
    "renderTibbleRow",
    function(x) standardGeneric("renderTibbleRow")
)
setMethod("renderTibbleRow", "Workshop", function(x) {
    github_user_repo <- strsplit(x@github, "/")[[1]]
    github_user <- github_user_repo[1]
    github_repo <- github_user_repo[2]
    tibble::tibble(
        Workshop = sprintf("[%s](https://%s.github.io/%s)&nbsp;&nbsp;", x@title, github_user, github_repo),
        Source = sprintf("[![GitHub Mark](/img/GitHub-Mark-32px.png)](https://github.com/%s)", x@github),
        Docker = htmltools::HTML(sprintf("<img src='/img/docker-vertical-logo-monochromatic.png' alt='Girl in a jacket' width='32' height='32'>"))
    )
})
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
paper9 <- Workshop(

    github = "stemangiola/bioc2021_tidytranscriptomics",
    docker = "stemangiola/bioc2021_tidytranscriptomics"
)
paper27 <- Workshop(

)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
workshop_table <- dplyr::bind_rows(
    renderTibbleRow(paper9),
    renderTibbleRow(paper27)
)
knitr::kable(workshop_table,
    format = "markdown",
```
